Env.Description: NIOS Grid host IP or Hostname
Env.Name: GRID_HOST

Env.Description: Specifies whether to verify server certificate
Env.Name: SSL_VERIFY

Env.Description: Infoblox WAPI request timeout in seconds
Env.Name: HTTP_REQUEST_TIMEOUT

Env.Description: Infoblox WAPI request connection pool size
Env.Name: HTTP_POOL_CONNECTIONS

Env.Description: Infoblox Network View for Global Address Space
Env.Name: GLOBAL_VIEW

Env.Description: Subnets will be allocated from this container when --subnet is not specified during network creation
Env.Name: GLOBAL_NETWORK_CONTAINER

Env.Description: The default CIDR prefix length when allocating a global subnet
Env.Name: GLOBAL_PREFIX_LENGTH

Env.Description: Infoblox Network View for Local Address Space
Env.Name: LOCAL_VIEW

Env.Description: Subnets will be allocated from this container when --subnet is not specified during network creation
Env.Name: LOCAL_NETWORK_CONTAINER

Env.Description: The default CIDR prefix length when allocating a local subnet
Env.Name: LOCAL_PREFIX_LENGTH

Mounts.Description: Location of the Infoblox config file (/etc/infoblox/docker-infoblox.conf)
/var/run/docker.sock is required to make call to Docker
